snippet: In testimony before a Congressional committee, Ben S. Bernanke defended the Federal Reserve against Republican accusations that its policies could allow higher inflation.
abstract: Republican members of a House committee criticize the Federal Reserve for working to reduce unemployment and revive the housing market rather than maintaining a single-minded focus on inflation; chairman Ben S Bernanke defends Fed, saying the economy, and the housing market in particular, will need help for years from the Fed and Congress.
lead_paragraph: In testimony before a Congressional committee, Ben S. Bernanke defended the Federal Reserve against Republican accusations that its policies could allow higher inflation.

headline.seo: Bernanke Hears Criticism From Republicans on Fed Strategy
headline.main: Republicans Sharply Question Bernanke for Fed’s Focus on Job Market
headline.print_headline: Republicans Sharply Question Bernanke for Fed’s Focus on Job Market
